actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To waive the individual and corporate income limitations for charitable contributions for the relief of victims of Hurricane Katrina.

summary.text: Charitable Donation Relief Act of 2005 - Waives limitations under the Internal Revenue Code on income tax deductions for individual and corporate charitable contributions made after August 28, 2005, and before January 1, 2006, for the relief of victims of Hurricane Katrina.

titles.title: To waive the individual and corporate income limitations for charitable contributions for the relief of victims of Hurricane Katrina.
